text: @SupraDarky PLAY IT ! Trust me. I recently finished it and it's a great game. I'll give it a 9/10 only because i don't like the site of blood. The sound track is banging. Rivals the like of Persona 3 and 4 soundtracks. This song you have up here is a remix of the classic outrun which is great but there are some original background music in this game that is better in my opinion. Don't get the ost to listen to it just yet. Play the game 1st so you can be shock and amazed.
